statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: Niagara edges Fairfield 57-56
article.story: NIAGARA FALLS, N.Y. -- Dominique Reid had 16 points and 10 rebounds and Matt Scott made two free throws with 23 seconds left to give Niagara a 57-56 win over Fairfield on Sunday. After Scott's free throws, which provided the fifth lead change down the stretch, Steve Johnston missed a 3-pointer with three seconds left. Wesley Meyers had 13 points and Scott had 11 for the Purple Eagles (8-21, 7-13 Metro Atlantic). Marcus Gilbert had 16 points and 10 rebounds for the Stags (7-23, 5-15). Tyler Nelson had four 3-pointers for 14 points and Jerome Segura had 11. Niagara gets the No. 9 seed and faces eighth-seeded Siena on Thursday while No. 10 Fairfield plays No. 7 St. Peter's. Fairfield had the biggest lead of the game, eight points, late in the first half. But the Purple Eagles scored the first six of the second half to tie it at 32 and it stayed close the rest of the way.
